name: Electabuzz

evolution.description: Electabuzz can evolve into Electivire at level 15 and above while holding an Electirizer. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Electric Pokémon. If a major power outage occurs, it is certain that this Pokémon has eaten electricity at a power plant.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.
